001// Copyright (c) FIRST and other WPILib contributors.
002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import java.util.Collections;
008import java.util.HashMap;
009import java.util.Map;
010
011/**
012 * A command composition that runs a set of commands in parallel, ending only when a specific
013 * command (the "deadline") ends, interrupting all other commands that are still running at that
014 * point.
015 *
016 * <p>The rules for command compositions apply: command instances that are passed to it cannot be
017 * added to any other composition or scheduled individually, and the composition requires all
018 * subsystems its components require.
019 *
020 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
021 */
022@SuppressWarnings("removal")
023public class ParallelDeadlineGroup extends CommandGroupBase {
024  // maps commands in this composition to whether they are still running
025  private final Map<Command, Boolean> m_commands = new HashMap<>();
026  private boolean m_runWhenDisabled = true;
027  private boolean m_finished = true;
028  private Command m_deadline;
029  private InterruptionBehavior m_interruptBehavior = InterruptionBehavior.kCancelIncoming;
030
031  /**
032   * Creates a new ParallelDeadlineGroup. The given commands (including the deadline) will be
033   * executed simultaneously. The composition will finish when the deadline finishes, interrupting
034   * all other still-running commands. If the composition is interrupted, only the commands still
035   * running will be interrupted.
036   *
037   * @param deadline the command that determines when the composition ends
038   * @param commands the commands to be executed
039   */
040  public ParallelDeadlineGroup(Command deadline, Command... commands) {
041    m_deadline = deadline;
042    addCommands(commands);
043    if (!m_commands.containsKey(deadline)) {
044      addCommands(deadline);
045    }
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Sets the deadline to the given command. The deadline is added to the group if it is not already
050   * contained.
051   *
052   * @param deadline the command that determines when the group ends
053   */
054  public void setDeadline(Command deadline) {
055    if (!m_commands.containsKey(deadline)) {
056      addCommands(deadline);
057    }
058    m_deadline = deadline;
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public final void addCommands(Command... commands) {
063    if (!m_finished) {
064      throw new IllegalStateException(
065          "Commands cannot be added to a composition while it's running");
066    }
067
068    CommandScheduler.getInstance().registerComposedCommands(commands);
069
070    for (Command command : commands) {
071      if (!Collections.disjoint(command.getRequirements(), m_requirements)) {
072        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
073            "Multiple commands in a parallel group cannot" + "require the same subsystems");
074      }
075      m_commands.put(command, false);
076      m_requirements.addAll(command.getRequirements());
077      m_runWhenDisabled &= command.runsWhenDisabled();
078      if (command.getInterruptionBehavior() == InterruptionBehavior.kCancelSelf) {
079        m_interruptBehavior = InterruptionBehavior.kCancelSelf;
080      }
081    }
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  public final void initialize() {
086    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
087      commandRunning.getKey().initialize();
088      commandRunning.setValue(true);
089    }
090    m_finished = false;
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  public final void execute() {
095    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
096      if (!commandRunning.getValue()) {
097        continue;
098      }
099      commandRunning.getKey().execute();
100      if (commandRunning.getKey().isFinished()) {
101        commandRunning.getKey().end(false);
102        commandRunning.setValue(false);
103        if (commandRunning.getKey().equals(m_deadline)) {
104          m_finished = true;
105        }
106      }
107    }
108  }
109
110  @Override
111  public final void end(boolean interrupted) {
112    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
113      if (commandRunning.getValue()) {
114        commandRunning.getKey().end(true);
115      }
116    }
117  }
118
119  @Override
120  public final boolean isFinished() {
121    return m_finished;
122  }
123
124  @Override
125  public boolean runsWhenDisabled() {
126    return m_runWhenDisabled;
127  }
128
129  @Override
130  public InterruptionBehavior getInterruptionBehavior() {
131    return m_interruptBehavior;
132  }
133}
